description: To mitigate the issue described in CVE-2023-5997, Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) users should update to version 119.0.2151.72, which was released on November 16, 2023. This version includes important updates that address the 'use after free' vulnerability in garbage collection, making it crucial for maintaining browser security. To check if you are running the latest version, open Microsoft Edge, click on the three dots in the top right, navigate to 'Help and feedback', and select 'About Microsoft Edge'. This update applies to both stable and extended stable builds for Windows 11, ensuring that all users are protected. Ensure that your environment is aligned with the most recent build by visiting the official update guide for installation steps and further details.
